body.name: [Electric Focus]OTOUCH Projector Native 1080P 18000LM 5G WiFi Bluetooth 5.2 Projector 4K Support 4P/6D Keystone/Zoom/Phone Mirror/HiFi Speakers/BT Remote/Tripod/Portable Case for Home/Outdoor 2024 New
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 13 mins
features: 【Electric Focus】 The OTOUCH upgraded Native 1080P projector eliminates the traditional physical manual focus mode, focusing can be done directly with the remote control, making it more convenient and accurate. Also, with fewer physical focus buttons, it reduces dust from entering the lens.

【18000LM/800ANSI--4K Decoding Tech】 This video projector has 18000 lumens/800 ANSI high brightness and Native 1920*1080P resolution, supports to play 4K source video （playback in 1080P resolution) 4K decoding technology solves the problem of non-4K projectors being unable to play 4K film sources, and the image expressiveness is much higher than that of only 1080P technology. In addition, its HI-FI stereo dual speakers, giant projection size will provide you with cinema-level enjoyment.

【IOS/Android Phone Screen Sync & 5G/2.4G Dual-Band WIFI--No lag, Smoother】This wireless projector supports 5G/2.4G dual-band WiFi, which can reduce video loading delay, make it faster and smoother to stream video. It supports ios Screen Mirroring and Android Wireless Display, no wire connection is required , make it easy to create a home theatre. (Note: Phone wired projection is not supported)(You need a TV Stick if you want to enjoy movies from Netflix, Disney, Amazon Prime, Hulu and Youtube)

【Bluetooth Remote Control/Two Way Bluetooth】Our upgraded Bluetooth remote control eliminates blind spots in traditional IR RC, allowing for smooth control of the projector at any angle. Our projector doubles as a Bluetooth speaker, thanks to its two built-in HiFi speakers. For even better audio quality when streaming video, you can connect it to an external Bluetooth speaker. Note: It does not support Dolby, so make sure to set the audio output to stereo on your streaming device to get sound.

【±50° 4 Points 6D Keystone Correction, Support Side Cast/50% ZOOM Function】 With latest 4 points keystone technology, four corners of projector image can be adjusted individually in ±50° direction, allowing for side casting. The 50%-100% ZOOM function allows you to adjust the size of the projected image without physically moving the projector. Additionally, with HDMI port, AV port, two USB ports, it can be connected to PS5, Switch, Blu-ray DVD, Computer, Laptop, USB Stick; TV box, Amazon Stick

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Good Image Quality 2 Wide Compatibility 3 Widely Available

Get Clear Image within Seconds Electric Focus More Accurate Focus Use remote control to adjust focus to get clear image Make Side Cast Possible 4 Corners+Vertical+Horizontal Keystone Adjust the four corners individually, the picture can better meet your needs Enjoy Big Screen 50%-100% Zoom Freely adjust the screen size 5W*2 Hi-Fi Speakers Real Speaker Effect Test Better audition experience, can also be used as a Bluetooth speaker alone.

Packing List Unboxing Video OTOUCH 1080P Projector*1;Tripod*1Carrying Case*1HDMI Cable*1; AV Cable*1 ; Power Cord*1; Remote Control*1; Cleaning Cloth*1; User Manual*1; Real Third-Party Testing High Picture Quality Native 1080PSupports 4K Decoding18000 Lumens Real Third-Party Testing Effect Comparison of Lights Switch Clear enough in natural light Turning off the light will have a better display effect Real Third-Party Testing Playing Games Refresh rate 60HzSuitable for most simple games Real Third-Party Testing Text Effect Display Suitable for PPT display

Only sound but no picture? Due to the limitation of HDCP protocol, projector can't play videos from Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney, Hulu, Youtube through phone casting, we suggest using TV Stick or HDMI connection to play videos from Netflix, Disney, Amazon Prime, Hulu,.etc. No sound, only images? Due to copyright issue, K6 does not support Dolby Audio, so there will be no sound. You can go to the settings of your streaming device and select Surround Audio option as ‘PCM’ instead of ‘Best Possible’ to get sound. How do I adjust the brightness of the projector? Play the video with U disk, press the OK button of the remote control to bring up the menu bar, click the rightmost setting button and select picture mode to adjust the brightness. You can also search 'OTOUCH HOW TO ADJUST BRIGHTNESS' on Youtube.

Notes--Please Read Carefully Before Purchasing and Using Due to the HDCP protocol, the projector cannot directly play movies from Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu App. You can use a TV stick to connect to the projector to watch movies from Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu.Because of the high-brightness bulbs, we have bigger fans for heat dissipation, so there will be some noise, but our speakers are also powerful enough that watching videos will not be affected at all.Due to copyright issues of Dolby Audio, this projector does not support Dolby. If it has no sound, go to setting of your streaming device and select Surround Audio option as ‘PCM’ instead of ‘Best Possible’ to get sound.Since there are many problems with the wired connection of the mobile phone, the wired connection of the mobile phone is not supported. It is more convenient to use a mobile phone wireless connection.There has an air inlet on the bottom of the projector. Please avoid other objects blocking the air inlet during using the projector or it will burn screen black.The remote control needs 2 AAA batteries to start, our remote control does not contain batteries. If it still doesn't work after installing the batteries, you can pm us for a free replacement.Using the projector in a dark environment will get a better viewing experience.For office use, we recommend purchasing a more professional projector.It is not Android projector.There is no interface jack on the back, so it can be placed directly with the lens facing up to project up to ceiling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The projector is great quality and sound. You don’t even need a screen, just a blank wall. The projector doesn’t need a sound system becuase it is very loud. It has a remote to adjust the focus which is functional. The quality of the picture is clear and crisp. It’s not blurry. You can play from your phone. You can connect to a laptop and you can connect gaming systems from it. Awesome projector for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money
reviews.reviewText: The projector works great! Image quality is top-notch and it has amazing sound quality as well. A go-to for movie nights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks and sounds great but smudges on new lenz
reviews.reviewText: Edit (After having for a month or so i am actually still shocked by how good it looks a d sounds, i hooked a 4k UHD ultra firestick to it and it looks good even during the day) Looks great so far but this is supposed to be brand new. Why scratches and smudges on Lenz? Unless you're charging brand new price for pre owned? Maybe I'm wrong but I find it weird

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bang for your Buck
reviews.reviewText: purchased this during the Black Friday sale and am using it as a travel projector. the built-in speakers are great and fill the room with sound. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This projector is amazing especially considering the price. It's bright enough for daylight use and incredibly sharp once you get the focus dialed in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Randomly got really loud
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this projector since Christmas and it’s been perfect. It’s clear and beautiful even during the day and it was so quiet. But beginning yesterday it’s begun making this annoying loud noise. It’s so random too. I turn it on one moment and it’s perfect. When I’m done watching, I turn it off and when I come back later to turn it on the loud noise will start and I have to turn it off. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but has its quirks
reviews.reviewText: A very nice projector for the money but has some issues. It is really hard to pair audio with it. I finally found some speakers that pair nicely with it. The projector itself is kind of loud with its fan. But overall, a decent projector. If I were to buy another I’d be looking for a quieter one for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelente proyector a un Excelente precio.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Lo compre para el black friday y la verdad estaba un poco escéptico debido a que hay muchos proyectores con precios que varían entre los $100 y los $3000. La verdad este proyector OTOUCH esta genial. Portátil, de buena calidad, buenos materiales, buena imagen. Viene con su estuche y un pequeño tripie. excelente para tardes de películas o conectarlo al Xbox. Completamente satisfecho y lo recomendaría sin dudarlo.
